::DarkMouse::

"Quickstrike, I can't go back to Megatron.  He will kill me for my 
failure for leaving you behind. As well as not being able to complete 
my mission during battle. If you command me to go back, I will go, 
but it will be to my death. Commander, what will you have me do?" she 
said almost pleading with him.  She knew that if he could talk to 
BlackArachnia, she might have a chance.  If not, she she was as good 
as scrap.
